sentence.Network_en: Green bristlegrass was dominant species, and fat hen and cockspur grass were subdominant species.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究区内有野生草本植物25种,其中优势种群是狗尾草种群, 亚优势种群为灰菜、稗草种群.
